articles.description: Twitter needs to do more work to fall in line with the European Union's tough new digital rulebook, a top EU official said after overseeing a “stress test”  of the company's systems in Silicon Valley.
articles.content:
Twitter needs to do more work to fall in line with the European Unions tough new digital rulebook, a top EU official said after overseeing a stress test of the companys systems in Silicon Valley.
